decks.notes: This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on playing low-cost creatures and utilizing burn spells to deal quick, direct damage to the opponent's life total. With a strong mana base and a mix of creatures that can pump out damage quickly, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. Cards like Monastery Swiftspear and Burning-Tree Emissary help to apply early pressure, while burn spells like Play with Fire and Atarka's Command can finish off the opponent or clear the way for a final attack.

The main objective of this deck is to quickly get Arclight Phoenix into the graveyard and then bring it back to the battlefield multiple times using various spells and abilities. The deck focuses on a combination of cheap spells and card draw to facilitate this strategy, while also including some disruptive elements like Brazen Borrower and Spell Pierce to control the opponent's plays. The deck aims to apply pressure early in the game and overwhelm the opponent with recurring threats from the graveyard.
